name: Match.io 2
description:
Welcome to "Match.io 2: Zig Zag".

The "Match.io 2: Zig Zag" is a new, free and addictive material design match 3 game for someone who is patient and wants to unlock all 1001 levels.

How to play:
Match the items into lines of 3 through 1001 challenging levels in this wonderful puzzle adventure.
Smash items and Crush cages.

Includes:
- Free download (with in app purchase)
- Fresh, minimal and material design style
- Well-known match 3 gameplay
- Dozens of Boosters
- 1001 well designed levels
- Powerful combo boosters and power ups
- Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
- Easy to play, challenging to master

Game Modes:
- Get the Target Score - Swipe items and splash them to reach the required score and get the stars
- Timed Levels - Get the targets before the time runs out
- Collect Items - Crush the items and collect all targets
- Blocks - Destroy all the target blocks
- Bomb - Destroy bombs until they explode
- Cage - Break cages

Fruit Boosters:
- Blast - Gives +5 extra moves
- Boost - Gives +30 seconds
- Splash - Replace some items colors
- Swipe - Crushes all items in a cross lines
- Shovel - Crush 1 item in the game
